methana proshne patan ganne swabhawika sini saha kruthimawa ekathu karana siniwalaathi wasi-awasi sahitha watapitawa ekkayi.swabhawika siniapita labenne,palathuru-kiri sahitha nishpadana wagema ala-bathala-bada iringu-wattakka wage elawalu walin.ee swabhawika sini, ape molaya wagema sirura pawichchi karanne indhanayak widiyata.ee nisa swabhawika sini rahithapalathuru walata oya wadi kamaththak dakwanawanam,oya oyage sirure shakthijanaka kriayakarithwaye gatalu walata lesiyenma goduru wenna puluwan.
